TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SectionInformation extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含有关配置层次结构中单个节的元数据。

span.span: Contains metadata about an individual section within the configuration hierarchy.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 对象包含有关配置层次结构中单个部分的元数据。The object contains the metadata about an individual section within the configuration hierarchy. 此对象可用于验证和更改个别节的属性。This object can be used in order to validate and change the properties of an individual section. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 与对象关联的元数据。The following example shows how to get the metadata that is associated with a object. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#91](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#91)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#91](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#91)] 下面的示例摘自上一个示例所使用的配置文件。The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file that is used by the previous example. ```xml
```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示配置节是否允许 特性。

value.span: 如果允许 特性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the attribute is allowed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为`false`, 则属性指示该节由本机代码读取器访问。When set to `false`, the property indicates that the section is accessed by native-code readers. 因此, 不允许使用`location`属性, 因为本机代码读取器不支持的`location`概念。Therefore, the use of the `location` attribute is not allowed, because the native-code readers do not support the concept of `location`. ## Examples 本节中的示例演示如何在访问配置文件中的相关节信息之后获取属性值。The examples in this section show how to get the property value after accessing the related section information in the configuration file. 下面的示例获取对象。The following example gets the object. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ConfigSource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ConfigSource : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置包含文件的名称，关联配置节在其中定义（如果存在这样一个文件）。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the include file in which the associated configuration section is defined, if such a file exists.

value.span: 包含文件的名称，关联的 在其中定义（如果存在这样一个文件）；否则为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The name of the include file in which the associated is defined, if such a file exists; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示为与`configSource` 对象关联的对象指定的特性的值。 The property represents the value of the `configSource` attribute that is specified for a object that is associated with the object. 实现可以选择指定一个单独的文件, 其中定义了该部分的配置设置。A implementation can optionally specify a separate file in which the configuration settings for that section are defined. 这可以通过多种方式来实现:This can be useful in multiple ways: - 使用包含文件可为配置文件生成更具逻辑性和模块化的结构。Using include files can result in a more logical and modular structure for configuration files. - 文件访问安全性和权限可用于限制对配置设置部分的访问。File-access security and permissions can be used to restrict access to sections of configuration settings. - 在应用程序初始化期间未使用的包含文件中的设置可以在不需要重新启动应用程序的情况下进行修改和重新加载。Settings in an include file that are not used during application initialization can be modified and reloaded without requiring an application restart. 下面的示例演示如何在配置文件中使用此属性来指定`pages`在外部包含文件中定义节:The following example shows how this attribute is used in a configuration file to specify that the `pages` section is defined in an external include file: `` 如果配置包含文件中的任何设置需要在修改应用程序时重新启动该应用程序, 请将属性设置`true`为。If any of the settings in a configuration include file require the application to restart when they are modified, set the property to `true`. 在 ASP.NET 应用程序中, 可以在运行时为属性分配备用配置文件的名称。In ASP.NET applications, at run time you can assign to the property the name of an alternative configuration file. 在这种情况下, 在 web.config 文件中包含的默认连接字符串信息将覆盖文件的内容。In that case, the contents of the file are overwritten by the default connection string information that is contained in the Web.config file. 当备用文件不存在并且在运行时创建该文件时, 也会发生这种情况。This occurs also when the alternative file does not exist and it is created at run time. 如果 Web.config 文件不包含任何连接字符串信息, 则会将一个空部分添加到备用文件中。If the Web.config file does not contain any connection string information, an empty section is added to the alternative file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConfigurationBuilder As ConfigurationBuilder

summary.span: 获取此配置节的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object for this configuration section.

value.span: 此配置节的 对象。

span.span: The object for this configuration section.

summary.span: 强制关联的配置节出现在配置文件中。

span.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果配置文件是从父文件继承的, 则不会在配置文件中写入该配置节。A configuration section is not written in a configuration file when it is inherited from a parent file. 如果希望父节显示在子配置文件中, 则必须将设置为。 `true`If you want the parent section to show in the child configuration file, you must set the to `true`. 这会使配置文件更易于从一台计算机移植到另一台计算机。This makes a configuration file more portable from one computer to another. 这还允许您确保该部分存在, 即使您无法控制父配置文件。This also lets you make sure that the section exists even if you do not have control over parent configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration() cil managed

summary.span: 强制关联的配置节出现在配置文件中。

span.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法强制将此声明写入配置文件。 The method forces this declaration to be written to the configuration file. > [!NOTE] > 方法可以强制将声明写入配置文件, 即使不需要该节, 因为它已在父文件中声明。The method can force a declaration to be written to a configuration file, even if the section is not required because it is already declared in a parent file. 使用方法可以使配置文件更易于从一台计算机移植到另一台计算机。Using the method can make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another. 这使您可以确保即使在您无法控制父配置文件时也存在该部分。It enables you to make sure that the section exists even when you do not have control over parent configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration(bool force) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration(bool require) cil managed

param.name: force
param.span: 如果应将关联的节写入配置文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the associated section should be written in the configuration file; otherwise, .

summary.span: 强制关联的配置节出现在配置文件中，或者从配置文件中移除现有节。

span.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file, or removes an existing section from the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为,`true`则方法强制将此声明写入配置文件。 `force`The method forces this declaration to be written to the configuration file if `force` is `true`. 如果`force` 为`false`, 则如果系统要求声明, 则此操作可能会被忽略。If `force` is `false`, this action might be ignored if the declaration is required by the system. > [!NOTE] > 方法可以强制将声明写入配置文件, 即使不需要此部分, 因为它已在父文件中声明。The method can force a declaration to be written to a configuration file, even if this section is not required because it is already declared in a parent file. 使用方法可以使配置文件更易于从一台计算机移植到另一台计算机。Using the method can make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another. 这还允许您确保该部分存在, 即使您无法控制父配置文件。This also lets you make sure that the section exists even if you do not have control over parent configuration files. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#113](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#113)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#113](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#113)]

exception.span: 为 ，且关联的节无法导出到子配置文件，或者该节未声明。

span.span: is and the associated section cannot be exported to the child configuration file, or it is undeclared.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在关联配置节中指定的设置是否由驻留在相关应用程序子目录中的应用程序继承。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the settings that are specified in the associated configuration section are inherited by applications that reside in a subdirectory of the relevant application.

value.span: 如果此 对象中指定的设置是由子应用程序继承的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the settings specified in this object are inherited by child applications; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示配置文件中`location`元素的属性。`inheritInChildApplications` The property represents the `inheritInChildApplications` attribute of a `location` element in a configuration file. 设置 为`false`以阻止特定于特定位置 (如网站的根目录) 的设置被子目录中存在的应用程序继承。Set to `false` to prevent settings that are specific to a certain location (such as the root directory of a Web site) from being inherited by applications that exist in subdirectories. 下面的示例演示如何在配置文件中使用此特性来指定子应用程序不应继承网站根的 location 元素中定义的设置:The following example shows how to use this attribute in a configuration file to specify that the settings defined in the location element for the root of a Web site should not be inherited by child applications: `` 此属性仅适用于位置特定的配置设置。The property applies only to location-specific configuration settings. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 对象的值。The following example shows how to get the value of a object. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `true`相关节被或属性锁定时, 属性将返回。 The property returns `true` when the related section is locked by the or the property. 如果在当前配置文件中无法重写或定义节, 则该节被锁定。A section is locked if it cannot be overridden or defined in the current configuration file. ## Examples 本节中的示例演示如何在访问配置文件中的相关节信息之后获取属性值。The examples in this section show how to get the property value after accessing the related section information in the configuration file. 下面的示例获取对象。The following example gets the object. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsProtected As Boolean
public: property bool IsProtected { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，指示关联的配置节是否受保护。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated configuration section is protected.

value.span: 如果此 已被保护，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this is protected; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 受保护的配置节是加密和只读的。Protected configuration sections are encrypted and read-only. 有关受保护配置部分的详细信息, 请参阅[使用受保护的配置加密配置信息](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For more information about protected configuration sections, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ## Examples 本节中的示例演示如何在访问配置文件中的相关节信息之后获取属性值。The examples in this section show how to get the property value after accessing the related section information in the configuration file. 下面的示例获取对象。The following example gets the object. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#102)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#102)] 下面的示例获取值。The following example gets the value. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#106)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#106)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 枚举值，该枚举值指定子配置文件是否可以重写关联的配置节。

span.span: Gets or sets the enumeration value that specifies whether the associated configuration section can be overridden by child configuration files.

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置一个值, 该值指示是否可由子配置`location`文件重写元素内声明的资源。 The property gets or sets a value that indicates whether resources declared inside a `location` element can be overridden by child configuration files. 属性获取或设置一个值, 该值指定类似的行为, 但对于特定的配置元素或组是如此, 并使用枚举值之一。 The property gets or sets a value that specifies similar behavior, but does so for a specific configuration element or group, and uses one of the enumeration values. 属性允许从父元素继承行为。The property enables behavior to be inherited from a parent element. 不能以编程方式设置和属性。You cannot programmatically set both the and property. 将属性设置为可 将属性设置为。 `true` Setting the property to `true` sets the property to . 将属性设置为可 `false`将属性设置为。 `false` Setting the property to `false` sets the property to `false`.

exception.span: 尝试更改 和 属性，出于兼容性原因，不支持这种更改。

span.span: An attempt was made to change both the and properties, which is not supported for compatibility reasons.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定子配置文件对配置节的默认重写行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the default override behavior of a configuration section by child configuration files.

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置节的属性只能设置为枚举的或值。The property of a configuration section can only be set to the or value of the enumeration. 将属性设置为等效于将值设置为。 Setting the property to is equivalent to setting the value to .

exception.span: 在父配置节中指定重写行为。

span.span: The override behavior is specified in a parent configuration section.

span.span: The protected configuration provider for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于未受保护的部分, `null`属性为。For unprotected sections, the property is `null`. 有关受保护配置部分的详细信息, 请参阅[使用受保护的配置加密配置信息](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For more information about protected configuration sections, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 对象的值。The following example shows how to get the value of a object. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ProtectSection(string protectionProvider) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void ProtectSection(string provider) cil managed

param.name: protectionProvider
param.span: 要使用的保护提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the protection provider to use.

summary.span: 标记用于保护的配置节。

span.span: Marks a configuration section for protection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法标记部分进行加密, 以便以加密形式写入磁盘。The method marks the section for encryption so it will be written in encrypted form on disk. 默认情况下包含以下保护提供程序:The following protection providers are included by default: > [!NOTE] > 如果调用 `null`带参数的方法或空字符串, 则类将用作保护提供程序。If you call the method with a `null` parameter or an empty string, the class is used as the protection provider. 有关受保护配置部分的详细信息, 请参阅[使用受保护的配置加密配置信息](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For more information about protected configuration sections, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#94](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#94)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#94](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#94)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RequirePermission { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RequirePermission : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取一个值，指示关联的配置节是否需要访问权限。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated configuration section requires access permissions.

value.span: 如果将 特性设置为 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the attribute is set to ; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为`true`时, `GetSection`方法受应用程序的信任级别设置的限制。When is set to `true`, the `GetSection` methods are restricted by the trust level setting of the application. 这意味着允许访问配置节处理程序的方法或属性受到为 Web 应用程序设置的信任级别的限制。This means that methods or properties that allow access to configuration section handlers are restricted by the trust level set for the Web application. > [!NOTE] > 因为 "高" 和 "完全信任" 是允许访问当前应用程序域外部的文件的唯一级别, 所以, 应用程序只能在这些信任级别使用配置节处理程序。Because high and full trust are the only levels that allow access to files outside the current application domain, an application can use configuration section handlers only at these trust levels. 当设置为`false`时, 对配置数据的访问不受应用程序的信任级别设置的限制。When is set to `false`, the access to the configuration data is not restricted by the application's trust level settings. > [!NOTE] > 无论设置如何, 都仍需要相应的文件 ACL (访问控制列表) 权限。The appropriate file ACL (Access Control List) permissions are still required, regardless of the setting. ACL 权限确定谁可以访问配置文件。ACL permissions determine who can access the configuration file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了当 `appSettings`节的属性为`true`时, Web 应用程序可能的两个信任级别。The following example shows two possible trust levels for a Web application when the property of the `appSettings` section is `true`. ```xml // With the following trust value // the code below works. // With the following trust value // the code below does not work. ``` 下面的示例显示了当信任级别设置为 "完全" 时, 运行没有错误的代码。The following example shows code that runs without errors when the trust level is set to full. 否则, 代码会导致错误。Otherwise, the code results in an error. ```csharp AppSettingsSection apSection = ConfigurationManager.GetSection("appSettings") as AppSettingsSection; NameValueCollection apSectionCollection = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings; ``` ```vb Dim apSection As AppSettingsSection = _ TryCast(ConfigurationManager.GetSection("appSettings"), AppSettingsSection) Dim apSectionCollection As NameValueCollection = _ ConfigurationManager.AppSettings ```

exception.span: 选定值与某个已定义的值冲突。

span.span: The selected value conflicts with a value that is already defined.

span.span: if a change in an external configuration include file requires an application restart; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将属性设置为`false` , 以防止在为此对象修改外部包含文件中的配置设置时重新启动应用程序。 Set the property to `false` to prevent an application restart when configuration settings in the external include file are modified for this object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 对象的属性值。The following example shows how to get the property value of a object.
